name: Vans UltraRange EXO HI MTE Gore-Tex Boots - Unisex
categories: UltraRange EXO HI MTE Gore-Tex Boots
description: Adventure along your local trails or rock mountain casual, the UltraRange are ready for where ever you take them. Durable leather and textiles handle the rigours of trails or concrete, while the lightweight cushioning keeps your feet happy all day. A Gore-Tex membrane ensures your feet stay dry, no matter what mother nature thinks.Suede and synthetic with a rubber toe cap that stands up to scrapes.Gore-Tex Invisible Fit waterproof-breathable membrane keeps feet dry.Wicking and warm liner keeps feet comfortable.UltraCush® Lite insole comforts underfoot.UltraCush® Lite midsole supports feet while cushioning against trail bumps.Rubber outsole with reverse waffle lugs provides grip on a variety of surfaces.
